title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20 §§ 8200-1.1 - Assessment of real property of railroads
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20 §§ 8200-1.1 - Assessment of real property of railroads

State Regulations

No later than the date for the filing of the tentative
assessment roll, the assessor or assessors shall provide the county director of
real property tax services with a written statement of the method(s) used by
the assessor apportioning the assessments of railroad real
property. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20
§§
8200-1.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
